H0.text: Bombay Sapphire is what type of alcoholic drink. Rum

H1.text: Bombay Sapphire is what type of alcoholic drink. Vodka

H2.text: Bombay Sapphire is what type of alcoholic drink. Whiskey

H3.text: Bombay Sapphire is what type of alcoholic drink. GIN

A4.text: Bombay Sapphire is a brand of gin that is distilled by the Bombay Spirits Company, a subsidiary company of Bacardi, at Laverstoke Mill in the village of Laverstoke in the English county of Hampshire.
